channel.title: Powell on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Powell on Archive 03

item.title: Why Did Trump Call Powell 'Stupid'?
item.description: President Trump has publicly criticized Fed Chair Powell, pressuring him to cut interest rates. Mew, Kurumi, and Mikael sharply analyze the current situation, where the hope for a short-term market boost clashes with the immense risk of undermining the central bank’s independence.
